verses.name: Ezekiel 32:6
verses.text: I will also water with thy blood the land wherein thou swimmest, even to the mountains; and the rivers shall be full of thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:7
verses.text: And when I shall put thee out, I will cover the heaven, and make the stars thereof dark; I will cover the sun with a cloud, and the moon shall not give her light.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:8
verses.text: All the bright lights of heaven will I make dark over thee, and set darkness upon thy land, saith the Lord God.
